thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: André Lafontaine
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 André Lafontaine

author: André Lafontaine
title: André Lafontaine
text:
On top of having a great choice of items at very competitive prices, Banggood takes care of their customers. Within 48 hours of having reported that an item in my last order received was not as described on their site, Linda from Banggood's customer service contacted me with a new order # for a replacement item being shipped.
No charge.Plus I get to keep the item previously received.
What more can you ask?
